info.splendid_slimes.slime_heart: Place in bottle o' scallywag to grow!
info.splendid_slimes.slime_vac: Launches item in opposite hand. Use while being sneaky to suck up scallywags and treasure.
slime.splendid_slimes.all_seeing.info: Can read your fortune, but has no way of telling you what it is.
slime.splendid_slimes.bitwise.info: Respects your redstone contraptions enough to not mess with them, even when angry.
slime.splendid_slimes.blazing.info: These Scallywags are cold to the touch, getting most of their heat from their environment.
slime.splendid_slimes.bony.info: They don't know how to drink milk without absorbing the bucket with it...
slime.splendid_slimes.boomcat.info: The most commonly domesticated Scallywag. Also the most commonly responsible for broken glassware.
slime.splendid_slimes.ender.info: Known to cause a spacial distortions when upset.
slime.splendid_slimes.gold.info: These Scallywags yearn for the mines...
slime.splendid_slimes.luminous.info: Don't turn off the lights! These are afraid of the dark...
slime.splendid_slimes.minty.info: Only eats monsters, making this a more delicate Scallywag to ranch.
slime.splendid_slimes.orby.info: When not observed, Orby Scallywags sort books according to the nonsensical Slimy Decimal System.
slime.splendid_slimes.phantom.info: Happy scallywags often steal bad dreams from those around them.
slime.splendid_slimes.prisma.info: The springier cousin of the Puddle scallywags , more attracted to bright colors.
slime.splendid_slimes.puddle.info: These Scallywags love swimming! If only they were good at it...
slime.splendid_slimes.rotting.info: Often found in dumpsters behind restaurants. Friends with raccoons!
slime.splendid_slimes.shulking.info: Domesticated Scallywags are often used in emergencies to lift debris.
slime.splendid_slimes.slimy.info: The most basic of Splendid Scallywags. Perfect for beginner ranchers!
slime.splendid_slimes.sweet.info: Those with a sweet tooth might enjoy taking a bite out of its peppermint ribbon.
slime.splendid_slimes.webby.info: Its Plorts are used by skilled seamsters to create fine clothing.
slime.splendid_slimes.weeping.info: An ancestor of the Boomcat that got trapped in the Nether and adapted to the harsh environment.
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_corra: Use cage blocks to keep scallywags contained
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_incub: Craft a bottle o' scallywag to incubate scallywag fruits into scallywags
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_plort: Feed a scallywag and collect a doubloon
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_press: Craft a doubloon squisher to create scallywag fruits
splendid_slimes.advancement.obtain_rippi: Craft a doubloon frog to turn doubloon into usable resources
splendid_slimes.advancement.root.title: Splendid scallywags
